title: garen is still a massive beast
body:
stomp him in lane? did garen shit the bed? dw, his simplicity and raw power spike with black cleaver will literally catapult him (and his team) back into the game

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1957269156/206434120?tab=overview

I played pretty badly against the yasuo top, but when i started grouping, nobody could deal with the spin to win and the true damage ultimates

thank god i was able to nab the first pick garen and nobody dodged
